content: Just thinking about growing together with <color=#ca8f50>{me}</color> and everyone else while building <color=#97c344>{homestar} Road</color>... I don't know why, but it really moves me!

Sleeping in tents after the tea party really feels like camping!
I want to get more familiar with this bubble world,
so I'll explore around a bit more~
<color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>If you're tired, remember to talk to Mobai before heading back to the tent.

But let's take it slow~ Time for a break!
*whispers* I saw Mobai preparing something special,
Why not have a chat with Mobai before heading back to the tent?
